title: Range to Word Conversion
description: This function converts a given real number into a word representation based on specified lower and upper limits. The conversion is performed by normalizing the input value within the limits and scaling it to fit into a word format.
name: RANGE_TO_WORD

input.name: X
input.description: The input real number that needs to be converted.

input.name: low
input.description: The lower limit for the range.

input.name: high
input.description: The upper limit for the range.

return_value.description: The word representation of the normalized input value.
